name: bluebird-co
description: A set of yield handlers for Bluebird coroutines

scripts.benchmark: grunt build-benchmark && matcha benchmark/build/arrays.js benchmark/build/objects.js benchmark/build/generators.js benchmark/build/thunks.js benchmark/build/errors.js
scripts.benchmark-rt: grunt build-benchmark && start /B /wait /Realtime matcha -R csv benchmark/build/arrays.js benchmark/build/objects.js benchmark/build/generators.js benchmark/build/thunks.js benchmark/build/errors.js >> benchmark/results.csv && pause

author: Aaron Trent <novacrazy@gmail.com>
